successes.title: SolForge Digital Trading Card Game
successes.description: The creators of Ascension and Magic: The Gathering have joined forces to create a revolutionary digital trading card game.

Pledges.description: You'll get access to our beta test so you can play the game before anyone else, and you'll receive a unique forum badge letting everyone know you've been with SolForge since the beginning.
All of the above, plus a unique Kickstarter only Avatar to show off your support in-game. On top of that, we'll give you five free booster packs to start off your collection when the game goes live!
All of the above, plus a starter deck for the faction of your choice when the game goes live.  In addition, you'll also receive a Kickstarter-only promotional card!
Brian Kibler Birthday Special! All of the above, plus a special birthday celebration avatar and a voucher for a free draft when they go live!
SPECIAL REWARD TIER: You'll get $15 in store credit when the game goes live, plus everything from the below reward tiers. (THIS TIER IS NOT INCLUDED IN ANY OTHER REWARD TIERS)

All of the above and a digital art book featuring the amazing art of the SolForge world! Plus you'll get entry into a Kickstarter-only tournament with awesome prizes once the game goes live, and you'll be listed in the credits of the game so everyone knows you helped make SolForge a reality!
SPECIAL REWARD TIER: You'll get $60 in store credit when the game goes live, plus everything from the $50 reward tier and below. (THIS TIER IS NOT INCLUDED IN ANY OTHER REWARD TIERS).
All of the above, plus an awesome SolForge Tshirt!  In addition, you'll get $100 in store credit to kick-start your collection. International donors please add $15 to help offset shipping costs.

SPECIAL REWARD TIER: For our backers not interested in physical rewards, this is an all-digital reward tier!  We won’t send you a T-Shirt, and instead you get an extra $20 of Store credit.  This makes it a total of $120 credit plus everything from the $50 reward tier and below.  (THIS TIER IS NOT INCLUDED IN ANY OTHER REWARD TIERS)
SPECIAL REWARD TIER: This is an all-digital reward tier! You'll get $200 in store credit, plus everything from the $50 reward tier and below. (THIS TIER IS NOT INCLUDED IN ANY OTHER REWARD TIERS)

SPECIAL REWARD TIER: This is the same as the $175 tier, but you'll also receive a T-shirt. (THIS TIER IS NOT INCLUDED IN ANY OTHER REWARD TIERS) International donors please add $15 to help offset shipping costs.
SPECIAL REWARD TIER: Games are more fun when played with friends, so this package gets you everything from the $100 package and below for you and a friend!  You can be SolForge best buddies!

We love sharing with friends so much, we’ll even give you a special SOLFORGE RECRUITER avatar in game to show off how awesome you are.   Please add $15 for international shipping on the T-Shirts if you want them. (THIS TIER IS NOT INCLUDED IN ANY OTHER REWARD TIERS)

All of the above, plus a print version of the art book.  In addtion, you'll be able to pick your favorite faction, and start the game with a full set of cards from that faction! International donors please add $15 to help offset shipping costs.

All of the above, plus one of EVERY CARD when the game goes live!  In addition, you will receive a printed copy of the SolForge art book signed by the Gary Games team! International donors please add $15 to help offset shipping costs.
All of the above, plus you'll really become a part of our world.  We'll comission a unique piece of art with your likeness to put on a card in a future set!
Brian Kibler Ultimate Birthday Tier!  All of the above, plus free drafts for life!  Your first SolForge draft every day will be free for the rest of your life!
All of the above, plus meet the Gary Games Team and Richard Garfield for dinner and gaming at Gen Con 2013! (You are responsible for your own travel)

All of the above, plus Magic lessons from Kibler!  Brian Kibler is a member of the Magic: the Gathering Pro Tour Hall of Fame. He'll give you one-on-one lessons on how to improve your Magic game, either online or in person (You are responsible for your own travel)

All rewards $2,500 and below, plus you'll be able to come out to sunny San Diego to meet the team and try your hand at designing cards for a future SolForge set!  (You are responsible for your own travel)
